title: Opinion: We helped create Medicare Advantage. Here’s how to fix it
description: Medicare Advantage is a vital program, and policymakers must focus on stabilizing the program over undermining it, write former HHS secretaries.
content: Medicare Advantage is a vital program, and policymakers must focus on stabilizing the program over undermining it, write former HHS secretaries.
